author: SO
text: I received a notification that the order couldn’t be completed and a refund would be issued.   So I found the same shoes cheaper and from the company and ordered them directly. They showed up 2 days later.  Your company did t alert me but then suddenly a shipping notification came and the second set of shoes arrived.  Now I have two pairs.  Thanks your your terribly managed company AND complete lack of communication.  Will NEVER order from you again.
title: Please don’t bother…

author: Ruth
text: I am not sure if it is Nike or if StockX is ignoring quality but I got the Nike Dunk Low White Black (2021) and the stitching was horrible. Not sure if I would purchase directly from StockX again as I do question the legitimacy of the shoe.
title: Nike Dunk Low White Black (2021)

author: Angel

text: The size chart misled me to buy a small size but I don't want to refund the money.
title: The size chart misled me to buy a small…

author: customer
text: I wish I could give it a negative -3 to be exact . Communication non existent, ridiculous service, and delayed responses. I have proof of the DHL driver admitting to sign for my package, yet I have yet to be refunded. I received an email yesterday stating that I will not be refunded because I signed for it. Just throw the company away. First, it was them selling fake shoes now the third party delivery company stealing and they’re ok with it. Contact BBB & local news get them shut down!!
title: Horrible Company 🗣😩
